programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: From the Shadows
programme.desc: Terri has a great life, a great boyfriend and she just won the lottery! Then she awakens to find herself in a dungeon being tortured by an insane doctor obsessed with his new date rape drug, in search of her winning lottery ticket. The horror she encounters is not only in front of her, but in the darkest recesses of her mind.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Trakā, dullā mīlestība
programme.desc: Kals Vīvers ir veiksminieks - viņam ir lielisks darbs, sapņu māja, jauki bērni un mīļotā sieva, ar kuru viņš iepazinās jau vidusskolā. Tomēr, kad Kals uzzina, ka sieva viņu krāpj un pieprasa šķiršanos, viņa ideālā dzīve mainās līdz nepazīšanai.

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Džeimsu Hārperu pēkšņi atvaļina no dienesta ASV Jūras kājnieku korpusā, nepiešķirot izdienas pensiju, viņš pievienojas privātai paramilitārai organizācijai, lai gādātu par savu ģimeni vienīgajā veidā, kādā viņš to prot.

programme.desc: Ziemeļu meža ceļš.

programme.title: Idiokrātija
programme.desc: Iepazīstieties ar Džo Baueru. Viņu gan nevar uzskatīt par izcilību, taču, kad valdības īpašais eksperiments ar iesaldēšanu izgāžas, viņš nonāk tālajā 2505. gadā. Sabiedrība ir degradējusies. To vada pilnīgs komerciālisms un trula televīzijas programma, un Džo kļūst par gudrāko cilvēku uz planētas. Tagad viduvējā Džo ziņā ir iegriezt cilvēces evolūciju pareizajās sliedēs!

programme.title: Gredzenu pavēlnieks. Karaļa atgriešanās
programme.desc: Gandalfs un Aragorns vada savu pasauli pret Saurona armiju, lai novērstu viņa skatienu no Frodo un Sema, kad viņi ar Gredzenu tuvosies Likteņa kalnam.

programme.desc: Nesekmīgs scenārists netīšām iepinies Losandželosas kriminālajā pasaulē. Tas noticis, kad viņa dīvainie draugi nolaupa gangstera mīļoto šicu.

programme.title: Nevainojami
programme.desc: 1960. gadu Londonā vecāka gadagājuma apkopējs pārliecina uz lāpstiņām nospiestu vadītāju palīdzēt viņam nozagt dimantus no viņu darba devēja - Londonas Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Trīs musketieri: DArtanjans
programme.desc: Jaunais DArtanjans pievienojies trim karaļa musketieriem, kuri darbojas, lai nodrošinātu Francijas nākotni.

programme.title: Džokers
programme.desc: Artūrs Fleks - ballīšu klauns un neveiksmīgs stand-up komiķis - dzīvo nabadzīgu dzīvi kopā ar savu slimo māti. Kad sabiedrība viņu atstumj un uzskata par ķēmu, viņš nolemj pieņemt haosa pilno dzīvi Gotemas pilsētā.

programme.title: Mēness Lēkta Karaļvalsts
programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.title: Takas
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete devusies 1700 jūdžu garā ceļojumā pa Austrālijas rietumu tuksnešiem, līdzi ņemot četrus kamieļus un savu uzticamo suni.

programme.title: Takas
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete devusies 1700 jūdžu garā ceļojumā pa Austrālijas rietumu tuksnešiem, līdzi ņemot četrus kamieļus un savu uzticamo suni.

programme.title: Melnais gulbis
programme.desc: Ņujorkas baleta trupas balerīnas Ninas dzīve ir deja. Viņa dzīvo kopā ar māti Ēriku, kas ir izbijusi balerīna un aizgūtnēm atbalsta meitas profesionālās ambīcijas. Kad mākslinieciskais režisors izlemj nomainīt prīmu izrādē "Gulbju ezers", viņa izvēle ir tieši Nina. Tomēr viņai uzrodas konkurente - jaunā dejotāja Lilī, kuras sniegums arī aizrauj režisoru. Izrādei ir vajadzīga dejotāja, kas spēj nodejot gan Balto gulbi ar nevainību un grāciju, kā arī Melno gulbi, kas iemieso viltu un jutekliskumu. Nina pilnībā atbilst Baltā tēlam, bet Lilī ir Melnā gulbja iemiesojums. Kad jaunās dejotājas uzsāk sāncensību par šo lomu, viņu draudzība kļūst arvien sarežģītāka un Nina arvien vairāk saskaras ar draudzenes rakstura tumšo pusi un abas ir gatavas viena otru iznīcināt.

programme.title: Mis Saulstariņš
programme.desc: Uz ekrāniem filma par vienu visdīvainākajām ģimenēm kino vēsturē - Hūveriem. Lai piepildītu jaunākās meitas Olivas sapni piedalīties skaistuma un talantu konkursā, viņi dodas ceļā uz Kaliforniju.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.desc: Ņujorkas baleta trupas balerīnas Ninas dzīve ir deja. Viņa dzīvo kopā ar māti Ēriku, kas ir izbijusi balerīna un aizgūtnēm atbalsta meitas profesionālās ambīcijas. Kad mākslinieciskais režisors izlemj nomainīt prīmu izrādē "Gulbju ezers", viņa izvēle ir tieši Nina. Tomēr viņai uzrodas konkurente - jaunā dejotāja Lilī, kuras sniegums arī aizrauj režisoru. Izrādei ir vajadzīga dejotāja, kas spēj nodejot gan Balto gulbi ar nevainību un grāciju, kā arī Melno gulbi, kas iemieso viltu un jutekliskumu. Nina pilnībā atbilst Baltā tēlam, bet Lilī ir Melnā gulbja iemiesojums. Kad jaunās dejotājas uzsāk sāncensību par šo lomu, viņu draudzība kļūst arvien sarežģītāka un Nina arvien vairāk saskaras ar draudzenes rakstura tumšo pusi un abas ir gatavas viena otru iznīcināt.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: Mis Saulstariņš
programme.desc: Uz ekrāniem filma par vienu visdīvainākajām ģimenēm kino vēsturē - Hūveriem. Lai piepildītu jaunākās meitas Olivas sapni piedalīties skaistuma un talantu konkursā, viņi dodas ceļā uz Kaliforniju.

programme.title: Rītdienas cilvēks
programme.desc: Eds Hemslers savu dzīvi pavada, gatavojoties katastrofai, kas varētu nepienākt. Ronija Meisnere savu dzīvi veltījusi, pērkot lietas, kuras visdrīzāk nekad neizmantos. Šie divi cilvēki mēģinās atrast mīlestību.

programme.title: Melnā kaste
programme.desc: Jauns, talantīgs analītiķis, kura specializācija ir lidmašīnu melnās kastes, mēģina atklāt traģiskas aviokatastrofas iemeslus.

programme.title: Valdības noslēpumi
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīta filma par britu aģentes nostāšanos pret savu valsti, lai publikai atklātu patiesību par ASV slepenās organizācijas NSA darbībām, lai sankcionētu iebrukumu Irākā.

programme.title: Rītdienas cilvēks

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Fatigue sets in as the chefs face hours seven and eight while turning one bag of ingredients into three distinct meals for judge Scott Conant.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Chauhan V. Lofaso
programme.desc: Bobby Flay, Maneet Chauhan and Antonia Lofaso go head-to-head in a spicy challenge, and the contestants cook global dishes over live fire.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Michael and Kwini challenge their friends and rivals, Lucy and Bret. Tia and Matthew Raiford battle to see who gets top billing in their home kitchen.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Mei Lin brings her competitive edge to Bobbys kitchen. As Michael Voltaggios former protege, shes ready to show that the student can outcook the master.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Gultā ar slepkavu
programme.desc: Nelabais ir detaļās… Nekas nav tā, kā izskatās, kad vienas nakts sakars pārtop sērijveida slepkavas nežēlīgā slepkavību virknē.

programme.title: Īlaijas grāmata
programme.desc: Pa postapokaliptisko zemi, kas reiz bija Amerika, ceļo kāds vīrs. Caur tukšām pilsētām, izpostītām autostrādēm - pa zemi, kas pārvērtusies pelnos. Šeit nav civilizācijas un nekādu likumu. Ceļi pieder bandām, kas nogalinās cilvēku par pāri kurpju vai malku ūdens. Taču sacensties ar vientuļnieku nav pa spēkam nevienam - Īlaija pieveiks ikvienu, kas to izaicinās. Tomēr viņš necīnās par savu labklājību, viņam ir misija, ko viņš apņēmies veikt līdz galam.

programme.title: Zombijzemē: Otrais šāviens
programme.desc: Nesaudzīgā un bezbailīgā zombiju mednieku četrotne dodas uz Amerikas vidieni, par savu jauno mājvietu atrodot Balto namu. Tur viņi stāsies pretī ne tikai jauna veida dzīvajiem miroņiem, bet arī citiem izdzīvojušajiem, kas nebūt nav draudzīgi noskaņoti. Turklāt viņu pašu vidū rodas nopietnas domstarpības.

programme.title: Naktsmītne
programme.desc: Topošā sieva ar diviem sava līgavaiņa bērniem apmetusies brīvdienu namā kādā attālā ciematā. Attiecībām atsalstot, sāk risināties dīvaini un biedējoši notikumi.

programme.title: 65: Iznīcības robeža
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofālas avārijas uz nezināmas planētas pilots Milss ātri vien aptver, ka viņam un otrai dzīvi palikušajai pasažierei Koai ir tikai vienīga iespēja izglābties – viņiem jātiek pāri nezināmajam apvidum, kuru pārņēmuši bīstami radījumi, un jāliek lietā visi spēki, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Vilks un Lauva
programme.desc: Pēc vectēva nāves 20 gadus vecā pianiste Alma atgriežas bērnības mājās. Drīz viņas dzīvē notiek negaidīts pavērsiens. Nez no kurienes uzradusies vectēva draudzene baltā vilcene atved savu mazuli un pati nozūd. Tad netālu avarē lidmašīna, un meitene tās atlūzās atrod brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvojušu lauvēnu. Alma nolemj abus paturēt, un notiek neticamais – mazuļi kopā aug un iemīl viens otru kā brāļus. Bet idilliskā pasaule sabrūk, kad viņu noslēpums nāk gaismā.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki
programme.desc: Komponists Deivs jau krietnu laiku cenšas gūt panākumus mūzikas nozarē. Lai gan viņa bijušais studiju biedrs ir ticis augstā amatā kādā ierakstu kompānijā, Deivam nekādi neizdodas sasniegt mērķi. Stāvoklis kļūst cerīgāks, kad Deivs iepazīstas ar trim dziedošiem burundukiem, kas slēpjas Ziemsvētku eglītē ierakstu kompānijas galvenajā ēkā.

programme.title: Eliots: pats mazākais ziemeļbriedis
programme.desc: Eliots ir mazs zirdziņš, kuram ir ļoti liels sapnis, - ieņemt godpilno vietu Ziemassvētku vecīša ziemeļbriežu pajūgā, lai dāvātu bērniem prieku svētkos. Pēc tam kad Ziemassvētku vecītis nāk klajā ar paziņojumu, ka tūlīt dosies pensijā, mazajam Eliotam atliek vien tikai trīs dienas, lai pieradītu pārējiem, ka viņš ir šī goda cienīgs, neskatoties uz to, ka viņam nav atbilstošu ragu. Ja kaut ko ļoti vēlies no visas sirds, tad brīnumi notiek, vai ne?

programme.title: Darba rūķis
programme.desc: Levons Keids pameta godalgotu militāro karjeru slepenajās operācijās, lai dzīvotu vienkāršu dzīvi, strādājot celtniecībā. Bet, kad viņa priekšnieka meitu, kas viņam ir kā radiniece, nolaupa cilvēku tirgotāji, viņš atklāj korupcijas pasauli, kas ir daudz lielāka, nekā viņš varēja iedomāties.

programme.title: Izlaušanās spēle
programme.desc: Seši savstarpēji nepazīstami cilvēki saņem ielūgumu piedalīties izlaušanās spēlē, kurā viņiem jāatrod izeja no dažādām telpām. Atrisinot virkni mīklu, veiksmīgais uzvarētājs balvā saņems 10 000 dolāru. Tomēr šķietami nevainīgā jautrība drīz izvēršas cīņā uz dzīvību un nāvi. Sapratuši, ka tam, kurš istabu pamet pēdējais, ir lemts mirt, viņi ir spiesti likt lietā visu savu atjautību, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Bagāts un veiksmīgs advokāts taisās precēties ar savu līgavu, taču drīz vien iesaistās sarežģītā narkotiku darījumā ar starpnieku, kuru dēvē par Vestreju. Plāns piedzīvo šausmīgu pavērsienu, un puisim jāsargā sevi un topošo līgavu, jo atklājas patiesība par narkotiku biznesu, un liecinieki tiek likvidēti.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Es esmu Rozīte
programme.desc: Leģendārā ielu modes ikona Rozīte klejojusi pa Lietuvas galvaspilsētas ielām vairākas desmitgades, iepriecinot garāmgājējus un tūristus. Vasaras nomainījuši rudeņi, ziemas – pavasari. Rozīte nerādās Viļņā. Viņas vientulīgās dienas iegaismo fotogrāfa ierašanās Neringā.

programme.title: Maskētie spiegi
programme.desc: Superspiegs Lenss Sterlings ir labākais savā profesijā un, būdams dzīvesprieka pilns, viņš ar lielāko prieku katru dienu glābj pilsētas un valstis. Jaunais zinātnieks Volters, kurš apgādā Lensu ar modernām ierīcēm, ir pilnīgs pretstats - būdams vienmēr drūms, viņš cenšas būt nošķirts no visas pasaules un palikt vienatnē ar saviem izgudrojumiem. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad neparastajam pārītim būs jāatrod kopīga valoda, lai ar neticamu brīnumu palīdzību izglābtu pasauli.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: Es gribu dejot. Vitnijas Hjūstones stāsts
programme.desc: Līksms, emocionāls un sirdi plosošs ieskats Vitnijas Hjūstones, visu laiku labākās RandB stila popa dziedātājas, dzīvē un mūzikā, sākot no paša sākuma līdz mūzikas jomas slavas zālei.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas dienasgrāmata
programme.desc: Bridžeta Džonsa ir jauna sieviete, kas pārdzīvo savu vecumu, svaru, darbu, neveiksmes privātajā dzīvē un citas nepilnības. Pienākot Jaunajam gadam, viņa apņemas beidzot sakārtot savu dzīvi, sākt rakstīt pilnīgi atklātu dienasgrāmatu. Dzīve uzņem apgriezienus, kas viņa sāk romānu ar savu bosu, kas izrādās vienkāršs brunču mednieks, un satiek otru savas dzīves vīrieti, kas izskatās diezgan garlaicīgs, tomēr ir lielisks.

programme.title: Gaismas impērija
programme.desc: Iespaidīgs un aizkustinošs stāsts par cilvēciskajām attiecībām, kino burvību, izcilu angļu dzeju un 80. gadu populāro mūziku. Ar šizofrēniju sirgstošā Hilarija (Olīvija Kolmana) strādā pilsētiņas kinoteātrī un ir spiesta samierināties ar sava priekšnieka Elisa kunga (Kolina Fērta) aizskarošo uzvedību. Visi par to zina, taču neviens neiejaucas. Tomēr viss mainās, kad darbā tiek pieņemts jaunais Stīvens. Neskatoties uz vecuma starpību, abi iemīlas.

programme.title: Jaunais vilks. Filma
programme.desc: Pasaulē parādījies šausminošs ļaunums, un vienīgi vilkači, kā Skots Makols, spēj saliedēt gan jaunos sabiedrotos, gan uzticamos draugus, lai cīnītos pret, iespējams, spēcīgāko un nāvējošāko ienaidnieku, kāds jebkad sastapts.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Es, Tonija
programme.desc: Tonija ir izcila maita. Un par visu vairāk pasaulē viņa dievina sliktos puišus, stipras cigaretes un pati sevi. Un vēl viņa ir ASV čempione daiļslidošanā un gatavojas doties uz Olimpiskajām spēlēm. Ir tikai jātiek vaļā no konkurentes – un šajā sakarā Tonijai viss ir jau izplānots.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Villarreal - Real Betis
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Fight Night: Reinier de Ridder vs Brendan Allen
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Anadolu Efes - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Davos - ZSC Lions
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.desc: All the action and stories of the elimination tournament in the National Hockey League consisting of four rounds of best-of-seven series. Who will be the league champion and the winner of the Stanley Cup?

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Bayern - Dortmund
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Izzy Battres works with his family to develop their own renovation business. They turn an Anaheim couples casita into the home of their dreams.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin pull off two renovations. Mark and Michael want a space to relax while Bethany and Daves growing family needs storage and functionality.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A family is ready to give up surfside California for the Colorado River in Arizona. They love boats, jet skis and want plenty of space for their toys.

programme.title: Island Life

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: An engaged couple searches for a home in beautiful Gulf Shores, Alabama, so they can be closer to the water and spend more time on their boat.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Izzy and the Battres family tackle a project with a homeowner whos terrified that a renovation will ruin the charming old house she loves.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Newlyweds turn to Izzy to update their 1960s home. But after unexpectedly losing a job, theyre hoping that he can stick to their strict budget.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Happy to be Home with the Benkos
programme.desc: In their biggest challenge yet, the Benkos transform a neighbours old boat shed into an entertaining space. Gray is pushed outside her comfort zone.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: California State Rangers turn to the brothers for a property that reminds them of park life, and a couple are ready to flee their small rental.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack McBrayer hits the road to find the wildest homes in the US and kicks things off at a home shaped like an actual shoe.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack explores more unique and wild homes including a jam-packed mansion, a replica mineshaft and a mountain home featuring a jungle theme.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna collaborates with a design employee to create a magical playroom full of surprises and multifunctional spaces for her three kids.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna works within a small budget and even smaller rooms to create a moody yet charming palette for practical spaces like a mudroom and art studio.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including Hitlers personal photo albums and James Bonds original Aston Martin. Plus, an FBI sting operation seeks a Civil War relic stained with human blood.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including Hitlers personal photo albums and James Bonds original Aston Martin. Plus, an FBI sting operation seeks a Civil War relic stained with human blood.

You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Tlingit folklore describes a creature thats half-otter, half-man, and steals the souls of its victims. Could a shapeshifting otter-man, or Kushtaka, be disguising itself to target humans as prey? Our team investigate whether this creature is a myth.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: At the Battle of Isandlwana in 1879, Zulu warriors overwhelmed an occupying British army in what became Englands worst defeat at the hands of a colonial force. Join modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, to discover their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Americas buffets, starting in Las Vegas. He learns shrimp-catching secrets in Florida, horseradish spice in Wisconsin, honey-making in California and sugar cane processing in Hawaii.
