programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Jaws @ 50: The Definitive Inside Story
programme.desc: On the 50th anniversary of the blockbuster film that shocked and excited the world, Steven Spielberg shares an exclusive look inside the story of Jaws. From Peter Benchleys epic novel to Spielbergs film, Jaws continues to influence pop culture, cinema and shark conservation. With interviews from Hollywoods most influential directors and shark scientists, the legend of Jaws is endless.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: Noah and the Great Flood is one of the Bibles best-known tales. Now, investigators seek to unravel the storys origins, which may predate the Old Testament. They explore some of the earliest cities in Mesopotamia, use the latest science to examine past climates, decipher clay tablets, and put an ancient blueprint of the Ark to the test. Immersive CGI brings this long-lost story to life.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: The story of Exodus is one of the great biblical tales, but why does ancient Egypt play such a central role? We follow a new season of excavations to find answers. Teams brush away layers of earth to reveal a magnificent lost palace and decipher reliefs from the temple of one of Egypts greatest pharaohs. New discoveries shed light on the period in which this biblical story was set.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police rush to handle a rare incident on a domestic flight: something suspicious in a Serbian citizens bag. Agents find liquid cocaine disguised in drink bottles in another mans bag. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police stop a woman travelling with her 5-year-old. If shes a carrier, agents must figure out what to do with the child. A Mexican citizen is found with a large amount of beer and soft drinks. All these goods may contain cocaine. Officers uncover a creative new method of hiding cocaine in food packaging.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: A fishermans tip leads Air and Marine agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands to over 80 kilos of cocaine washed ashore on a public beach. Two fishing vessels are intercepted between the Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico, suspected of smuggling drugs. Agents from the Fajardo unit patrol remote trails showing signs of drug trafficking routes.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo chase a vessel to a marina and suspects flee, leaving over 280 kilos of cocaine hidden inside. Mayaguez AMO agents provide armed transport for the USCG, transferring a murder suspect from sea to airfield. Later, they intercept a migrant vessel by shooting out its engine. Agents in the U.S. Virgin Island seize over $750k in cash from a smuggling vessel.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Interdiction agents in Mayaguez intercept traffickers coming from the Dominican Republic with over $60 million in cocaine onboard. In Fajardo, agents investigate a boat suspected of smuggling cocaine from St. Thomas to Puerto Rico. In the U.S Virgin Islands, agents search for a sunken vessel believed to be carrying bulk cash from drug dealers.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations newest agent in Mayaguez gets his first major seizure when he uncovers over $8 million of cocaine hidden inside a boat. Homeland Security Investigations arrests multiple longshoremen at a seaport involved in a smuggling ring responsible for importing cocaine from the Dominican republic. AMO agents in Fajardo and USVI team up and race to Culebra to intercept a smuggler.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Explorer Albert Lin searches the Peruvian Andes for the lost Chachapoya kingdom, a forgotten civilization in the clouds, that ruled for nearly 1000 years before the conquering Inca. Alberts expedition will take him from raging rapids to the dense cloud-forests of the Andes, using his extraordinary tech to reveal the lost world of the Cloud Warriors.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: First century AD and the Romans dominate much of the known world. But their plans to conquer Scotland are foiled by a band of barbarian insurgents called the Picts. Explorer, Albert Lin scales sea cliffs, explores caverns, swims rapids and uses high-tech scanners to discover a lost kingdom that may answer how the mysterious Picts were behind one of the greatest military upsets of their time.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Draining Lake Michigan uncovers Chicagos secret history. The latest sonar technology exposes a catastrophe that kills 300, solves a tragic Christmas mystery, uncovers a game-changing naval training programme from World War 2 and reveals an engineering marvel that stops the fastest growing city in the world from choking to death. Chicagos spectacular story is all about ambition and risk - only sometimes those risks end in disaster.

programme.title: Megacity Of the Maya Warrior King
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin travels to the jungles of Central America to solve an ancient mystery: who defeated the most powerful Maya city to have ever existed? programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Compared to the number of suicides in the general population, suicidal pilots are almost statistically non-existent. But when they do emerge from obscurity to unleash their horrific plans on innocent passengers, the destruction they inflict is epic. A 737 cruising above an Indonesian jungle suddenly plummets from the sky. An Airbus A-320 crashes into the French Alps. And, Malaysian Airlines Flight 370 vanishes over the South China Sea, and remains one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Chalks Ocean Airways Flight #101 Grumman Turbo Mallard (sea plane) December 19th, 2005 Destined for the Bahamas, Chalks Ocean Airways Flight #101 is preparing for takeoff in the waters off Miami Beach, Florida. Part plane, part speedboat, the twin turbo-prop taxis through one of the worlds busiest ports, and after a smooth takeoff, climbs towards the clouds. A minute later, however, just as the plane is climbing through 500 feet, it is suddenly rocked by an explosion and, from the beach, a tourist films the aircrafts catastrophic plunge into the ocean. Lifeguards immediately race to the crash site but there are no survivors. Eyewitness reports and the tourist video confirm one of its wings ripped off in mid-air. But can investigators determine why?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Twenty minutes after taking off from Taipei, Taiwan a China Airlines 747 suddenly disappears from radar. A massive rescue mission is launched, ut all 225 passengers and crew are dead. After ruling out both a bomb and a gas tank explosion, investigators are stumped. They examine hundreds of pieces of wreckage until they discover a single piece of the hull that solves the riddle. Tragically, the crash of Flight 611 began with a problem that began twenty-two years earlier.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Explorer Albert Lin searches Israel for the lost city of the Canaanites, a mysterious civilisation who survived a biblical era, climate apocalypse. The expedition takes him scuba diving for 4000-year-old shipwreck treasure and through a terrifying incident on a crumbling cliff face. Using extraordinary tech, Albert reveals a spectacular maritime world, built by these ancient climate survivors.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: First century AD and the Romans dominate much of the known world. But their plans to conquer Scotland are foiled by a band of barbarian insurgents called the Picts. Explorer, Albert Lin scales sea cliffs, explores caverns, swims rapids and uses high-tech scanners to discover a lost kingdom that may answer how the mysterious Picts were behind one of the greatest military upsets of their time.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Arabia
programme.desc: In "the Lost Treasures of Arabia: The Nabataean Kingdom" episode, we will look at Hegra, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, that was the principal southern city of the Nabataean kingdom, famed for its spectacular monumental tombs. Although Hegra is lesser known to the general public, its an important place to understand this highly advanced Nabataean society.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: The Mongolian Empire launched a devastating campaign through the lands of Russia and Europe, crushing knights with Mongol speed and strategy. As they prepared to push deeper into Europe, news of Ogedeis death halted the advance, triggering a struggle for succession over an empire that now stretched from China to Europe, the largest the world had ever seen.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost World of the Maya
programme.desc: In northern Guatemala lies a hidden city devoured by the wild, relentless jungle. Local people discovered strange hills arranged in massive circles. Archaeologists realized this was the religious and cultural center of the Mayan Civilization. Some of these ruins are being brought to life with the aid of satellites and a laser scanning technology called LiDAR. In the past year, LiDAR images unveiled an astonishing but hidden jungle metropolis. Homes? highways? defensive walls? pyramids. In all, more than 60,000 structures, their outlines invisible to the naked eye. Taken together, they point to a far more sprawling and sophisticated civilization than we ever imagined possibleand they raise a provocative question: How could such a great society fail?

programme.title: Megacity Of the Maya Warrior King
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin travels to the jungles of Central America to solve an ancient mystery: who defeated the most powerful Maya city to have ever existed? With the help of new technology he tracks down the mighty warrior conqueror and reveals his capital - that may be the largest Maya city ever discovered!

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Draining Lake Michigan uncovers Chicagos secret history. The latest sonar technology exposes a catastrophe that kills 300, solves a tragic Christmas mystery, uncovers a game-changing naval training programme from World War 2 and reveals an engineering marvel that stops the fastest growing city in the world from choking to death. Chicagos spectacular story is all about ambition and risk - only sometimes those risks end in disaster.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The latest sonar technology reveals shipwrecks as never seen before. As water and land drain away: a secret beneath Manhattans skyline, an earth-shattering feat of engineering, a record-breaking icon and a casualty of WWI stealth warfare. Examining these hidden giants can explain New York Citys meteoric rise to bustling world metropolis. A city that cant be kept down, forever pushing forward, with true grit and determination.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Lightning bolts cause construction mayhem whenever they strike buildings. All over the world, cities are sinking for very different reasons, and cooling towers are collapsing. A Mexico City metro train and many bridges in India all fall down. While in Dallas, an unlucky demolition becomes a cousin of the Leaning Tower of Pisa and a social media sensation. Regular people show off their MacGyver skills prompting the question: genius or harebrained?

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: An Italian supermarket under construction drastically collapsesy. Amusement parks become a lot less amusing when fires break out; Indias tunnel workers are trapped in a catastrophic collapse; Canadas light rail fails over and over again; and a stadium loses its lid to a hurricane. Plus, theres a look at how home constructions been misled by lead.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. programme.title: Africas Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: Instead of providing in-depth examinations of the fauna of the continent of Africa, this nature series alternatively focuses on the hostile and unforgiving landscapes that the animals have to survive in. Africa is home to some of the most extreme and diverse environments on the planet, from arid deserts to lush rainforests, mountainous peaks to mighty river and lake systems, savannah grasslands to rugged coastline. This show explores these different regions and documents how the plants and creatures that inhabit them endure places where there are few resources of food and water or where competition is rife and life-threatening. The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. This legendary serpent has a plethora of assets - venom, agility, speed and sensory superpowers - that make it a master its habitat, despite being the most hated serpent in Africa.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: From surgery and a rare diagnosis to emergency cases, the Schroeders are always there for mans best friend. Ben and Erin race to treat a dog with a strange itch, help a dog with severe lethargy, and treat a puppy with a mysterious condition. Despite the challenging cases, the Schroeders do not rest until these precious pets are on a path to recovery.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: The dog days are upon the Critter Fixers, when an itchy golden retriever comes in with a mysterious infection. A chihuahua arrives with a gastrointestinal inflammation issue, while another dog arrives with what may be an infection of her uterus. A fluffy pooch has a UTI, while a dog named Island Girl comes in after eating two of her owners socks.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: When Predators Attack
programme.desc: This docuseries detais what happens when predators come face to face with their prey and humans and reveals the reasons why dangerous encounters take place and the best way for people to avoid them or to make a quick escape if necessary. Each one hour long episode focuses on a specifice animal including formidable killer snakes that use deadly venom or constriction to defeat their opponent; black bears, grizzlies, and giant polar bears who are increasingly encroaching into human territory because of climate change and are confronting more humans; and the most ancient of predators, the crocodile.

programme.title: When Predators Attack
programme.desc: This docuseries detais what happens when predators come face to face with their prey and humans and reveals the reasons why dangerous encounters take place and the best way for people to avoid them or to make a quick escape if necessary. Each one hour long episode focuses on a specifice animal including formidable killer snakes that use deadly venom or constriction to defeat their opponent; black bears, grizzlies, and giant polar bears who are increasingly encroaching into human territory because of climate change and are confronting more humans; and the most ancient of predators, the crocodile.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers are one of the most feared snake families in the world. Now their stories reveal just how troubled life can be for hated snakes. Rattlesnakes in the desert cheat death by predators and people. Puffadders clean up vermin, yet face persecution. And gaboon vipers on the forest floor dare not move. This is an intimate look at their challenges and how they overcome each with unique superpowers.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Charmed by some, feared by most - the cobra family is powerful and iconic. From giant cannibalistic king cobras in India, to desert specialists that hunt birds in the Kalahari and semi aquatic Forest cobras stalking toads in African swamps, each one has a unique story and set of challenges to overcome.

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Scientists and hunters team up to fight one of the biggest ecological threats to the Florida Everglades: the Burmese python. In the 1990s, pet pythons were released into the wild and have eaten their way through the food chain. Today, nobody knows how many there are, but estimates may be in the hundreds of thousands. We follow the scientists as they track, gather data, and try to understand better how Pythons reproduce and adapt in the Everglades. Ian Bartoszerk and his team at the Conservancy of Southwest Florida use male scout snakes to lead them to females with the potential to lay up to eighty eggs at a time. At the U.S.G.S., Amy Yackle and Mark Sandfoss work in tandem with wildlife biologists from the National Park Service and the University of Florida to battle female reproduction on another front — Alligator Alley.

programme.title: Dragons Uncovered
programme.desc: The Komodo Dragon has captured our imaginations for over a century, yet so much about this incredible lizard remains a mystery. A creature with survival skills and physical characteristics seen in apex predators across the animal kingdom, and the ability to take down predators ten times its size. The secrets of the Komodo Dragon are revealed.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Despite their ancient appearance, reptiles are creatures full of surprises and sophistication. Much like dinosaurs, reptiles are hugely efficient hunters.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: The sparse African Savannah can be a fearsome place for both herds of powerful prey and the lurking predators who hunt them down. In this captivating documentary series from National Geographic, the relationship between predator and prey is closely examined, exploring the fight for survival for both sets of animals. These herds are full of powerful or agile animals, making the job of a predator to feed itself and its family a troublesome task. But the African predators are ruthless and proficient hunters, and if a herd is infiltrated, or a straggling member is targeted, they will struggle to evade these savage carnivores.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: She haunts the trees and hills in the heart of the realm. She is solitary, silent and virtually invisible. Saba the leopard is a killer without rival. Saba is the most spectacular and resourceful hunter the Savage Kingdom has seen. Her stronghold, Leopard Rock, sits at the heart of this brutal realm it is a place where she can vanish into the shadows and avoid running into her rivals lions, hyenas and wild dogs. There is no question that Saba the leopard can take care of herself, but her strength and resilience will be cruelly tested when she tries to bring two cubs into the realm where only she can protect and feed them in the midst of the cauldron of warring predators. The ordeal will tear at her heart.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: The Docs at Critter Fixer wrangle some rambunctious sugar gliders, treat a dog with severe smoke inhalation and inspect piglets who might have mites. The Docs check out a couple of rabbits who are all ears, tend to a ferrets tail, treat a family cat with a hernia, and get up close with a gator. Finally, Dr. Hodges and vet tech Sierra turn to ancient Eastern medicine to help her horse.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: The Schroeders solve a slate of mysterious cases: Dr. Erin gets to the bottom of a cats laboured breathing while Dr. Ben provides relief for a flock of featherless chickens and a bull with a bum hoof. A bald eagle is rushed in with a life-threatening wound before the vets join forces to remove a Pitbulls cancerous lump. Between cases, the docs motivate each other to shed a few unwanted pounds.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem dodas palīdzēt ziloņa Edmonda dzimšanas dienas ballītē, bet mazos bērnus ir grūtāk pieskatīt, nekā viņi domāja.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs no rīta pamostas un atklāj, ka lietus dēļ radušies plūdi, un viņu māja tagad ir sala!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni apmeklē jauno atrakciju parku ar dārzeņu tematiku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs apmeklē Buļļa kunga celto māju. Vai viņi uzzinās, kas ir viņu jaunie kaimiņi?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis māca bērniem spēlēt basketbolu, un drīz vien viņi ir gana labi, lai spēlētu komandā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Jūtama aizrautība, kad Zebras kungs piegādā Pepai un Džordžam paciņu no tantes Dotijas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Daktera Kāmja bruņurupucis iestrēgst kokā. Kurš dosies viņu glābt?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs atklāj, ka viņiem ir ēnas. Lai kur viņi ietu, viņi nespēj no tām aizbēgt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un robots Padingtrons izbauda varoņu lomu Vindzoru dārzos, bet kas ir tās dīvainās emocijas, ko izjūt robots? Padingtons atklāj, kā būt mierīgam saspringtā situācijā, un varonīgi aptur bēgošu kartingu!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Aizraujošākās ģimenes atgriešanās uz ekrāniem! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Viņiem rutīna neeksistē, katra diena ir priecīgu pārsteigumu pilns notikums!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem pārģērbjas tērpos no dažādām pasaules valstīm, bet tad sastrīdas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis māca Pepai un Džordžam jautru spēli, ko spēlēt, kamēr gaida, kad pierims lietus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Visi ir sajūsmā, kad Trušu mamma paziņo, ka gaida mazuli! Vai tas būs viens mazulis vai dvīņi?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ponijs Pedro izliekas, ka ir kovbojs, stāstot visiem stāstus nometnē, kas izveidota dārzā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs ierodas ar sēklām Pepai un Džordžam. Tētis palīdz, tēlojot putnubiedēkli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Dakteri Kāmi visu dienu apmeklē gandrīz visi pacienti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs iepazīstas ar ķenguru Kailiju un viņas brāli Džoju. Pepa parāda Kailijai, kā lēkāt pa peļķēm, bet kura uzlēks visaugstāk?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Lai svinētu lapsas Fredija dzimšanas dienu, bērni dodas uz Dinozauru parku. Vectēvs Trusis ir viņu līderis, viņi seko dinozauru pēdām, lai atrastu Fredija dzimšanas dienas našķus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis apmetas mājā, ko viņam uzceļ Fransuā tētis.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed."

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf is returning from an expedition to find rare ingredients when one of them is accidentally eaten by one of Farmers snails. A few days later, Brainy is attacked by a creature that turns him into a zombie, and soon the whole village is contaminated. Lily and Farmer have to work together to find the monster and give it the antidote that will save the village! // Gargamel strikes a deal with Rowena: he will take her to see her favorite singer in concert and she will accept to be turned into the Smurfette so that he can trick his mother, who thinks hes completely useless. But as soon as she sees her, Granny is reminded of her childhood doll and falls under her spell. Meanwhile, in the forest, the real Smurfette is rehearsing a play with Dimwitty and Poet when both Smurfettes switch places by accident: Rowena is now acting in the play for Poet and Smurfette ends up at Gargamels hovel..

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: No one wants to look after Baby Smurf! So Brainy decides that Smurfette should do it, and shes determined to do a good job and to teach him smurf-fu. But then Grouchy gets involved, and he wants to prove that hes the best babysitter in the village! So war between the two candidates is declared. They have to compete in different challenges to decide which one of them is the best babysitter. // Blossom dreams of traveling to Mars, so Handy puts his ingenuity to the test to get her there. When Lily and Storm learn about this amazing project, they decide to help their friend, even though they will miss her when shes away. But they need to make sure that Brainy doesnt find out because Papa Smurf has forbidden all trips to Mars! Will Blossom manage to take off into space and leave all of her friends behind?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents an incredible machine that can translate what animals say. He wants to help solve their problems. But Clumsy breaks the machine and needs to make sure that his friends dont find out! So he swaps places with a bear and starts talking in its place. There are misunderstandings all over the place in the village and the Smurfs think that theyre actually talking to a real bear ... who really needs their help. // Dimwitty and Clumsy cause a huge accident when their fire truck collides with Papa Smurfs laboratory. Hes fed up with their nonsense and orders them to clean everything up. In doing so, and thinking that hes doing the right thing, Dimwitty empties some of the potions into the toilet, opening a portal with other worlds! Theyre going to have a hard time finding the way back with the toilet cubicle as a ship.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast in Late for Breakfast, then in Bummer Jobs, Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce. ) 09:31 SpongeBob SquarePants The biggest mystery 20,000 leagues beneath the sea is uncovered when SpongeBob and the gang find the lost city of Atlantis, in this special SpongeBob TV movie! Guest starring David Bowie. (Subtitled)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Ellie and the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers. When Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him! // Eager to become Master Criminals, Lil and Jack help Chuck with his "dirty laundry". But are they ready for a life of crime?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale. ) 08:31 SpongeBob SquarePants The biggest mystery 20,000 leagues beneath the sea is uncovered when SpongeBob and the gang find the lost city of Atlantis, in this special SpongeBob TV movie! Guest starring David Bowie. (Subtitled)

programme.desc: When Lily starts digging to find out why her favorite ice cream truck is selling shaved ice, she uncovers a town-wide conspiracy. // Dirk is wrongfully accused of stealing a Canyon Valley landmark so Min comes out of lawyer retirement to help him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Its a busy day at the laundromat! While Squidward struggles to scrub a stubborn stain out of his shirt, we see other Bikini Bottomites tending to their laundry as well - including Plankton, who is using a washing machine to clean up some laboratory equipment. Turns out, the equipment is covered in leftover mutation formula which causes the washing machine to mutate into a raging monster! After it terrorizes the patrons, Squidwards tough stain defeats the monster and everyone celebrates with a song! // SpongeBob goes to Old Man Jenkins farm and finds Patrick watching over Old Man Jenkins prized worm hog, Beulah... who has suddenly gone missing! Furious, Old Man Jenkins sets out with them to find her. After a long fruitless search, Old Man Jenkins turns on them! SpongeBob and Patrick hide out inside Old Man Jenkins beard, but Old Man Jenkins tries to smoke them out, starting a fire! Just in time, Beulah returns and saves them! She wasnt lost, she took herself to the county fair and won first prize!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.
